meanings.definition: To surpass in glitter or sparkle.
meanings.sent1: The sun outglitters the stars in the sky.
meanings.sent2: Her diamond necklace outglitters all the other jewelry.
meanings.sent3: The disco ball outglitters the birthday cake.
meanings.sent4: The fireworks outglitters the city lights on New Year's Eve.
meanings.sent5: The glittering gown outglitters everything in the store.

meanings.definition: To shine more brightly than something else.
meanings.sent1: The lighthouse outglitters the moon on a clear night.
meanings.sent2: The new LED lights outglitters the old incandescent bulbs.
meanings.sent3: The smile on her face outglitters the sun itself.
meanings.sent4: The sparkling river outglitters the dull pavement.
meanings.sent5: The gemstone outglitters all the other stones in the collection.
